_header: Forsake thy pride and thine envy
Title(s): Song of the Seven Deadly Sins
Subjects: carols, of religious counsel; sins, deadly
_description: John Audelay, Song of the Seven Deadly Sins — five 5-line stanzas (ababc) including refrain, ‘I say þe so’, and burden (cc): ‘In wele be ware ore thou be woo / Thenke wens thou come wheder to goo’

BodDou302.First Lines:
ffore sake þi pride & þyn enuyþu schalt fynd hit
                    fore þe best…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…ffore to heuen þer is no noþer wayI say þe
                    so

         5 (1910): 473-91: 480.

                        ed.
